name: Champion Ribbon

desc: A Ribbon awarded for clearing the Pokémon League and entering the Hall of Fame somewhere long ago.

name: Coolness Master Ribbon
title: the Former Star
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has perfectly embodied Coolness in Pokémon Contests.

name: Beauty Master Ribbon
title: the Vintage Beauty
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has perfectly embodied Beauty in Pokémon Contests.

title: the Former Idol
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has perfectly embodied Cuteness in Pokémon Contests.

name: Cleverness Master Ribbon
title: the Historic Genius
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has perfectly embodied Cleverness in Pokémon Contests.

name: Toughness Master Ribbon
title: the Formerly Buff
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has perfectly embodied Toughness in Pokémon Contests.

name: Contest Star Ribbon
title: the Shining Star
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has performed superbly in every kind of contest.

name: Twinkling Star Ribbon
title: the Twinkling Star
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that has perfectly embodied shining brilliance in Super Contest Shows.

name: Contest Memory Ribbon
title: the Treasured Memory
desc: A commemorative Ribbon representing all of the Ribbons you collected for contests somewhere long ago.

name: Contest Memory Ribbon
title: the Treasured Memory
desc: A commemorative Ribbon representing all of the Ribbons you collected for contests somewhere long ago.

name: Battle Memory Ribbon

desc: A commemorative Ribbon representing all of the Ribbons you collected for battling somewhere long ago.

name: Battle Memory Ribbon
title: the Exciting Memory
desc: A commemorative Ribbon representing all of the Ribbons you collected for battling somewhere long ago.

name: Skillful Battler Ribbon
title: the Veteran
desc: A Ribbon that can be given to a Pokémon that has achieved victory in difficult battles.

name: Expert Battler Ribbon
title: the Master
desc: A Ribbon that can be given to a brave Pokémon that has honed its battle skills to an art.

name: Battle Tree Great Ribbon
title: the Tree Victor
desc: A Ribbon awarded for winning against a Battle Legend in the Battle Tree.

name: Battle Tree Master Ribbon
title: the Tree Master
desc: A Ribbon awarded for winning against a Battle Legend in super battles in the Battle Tree.

name: Tower Master Ribbon
title: the Tower Master
desc: A Ribbon awarded for winning against a champion in the Battle Tower.

name: Artist Ribbon
title: the Model for Paintings
desc: A Ribbon awarded for being chosen as a super sketch model in the Hoenn region.

name: Effort Ribbon
title: the Once Well-Trained
desc: A Ribbon awarded for being an exceptionally hard worker.

name: Alert Ribbon
title: the Once Vigilant
desc: A Ribbon for recalling an invigorating event that created life energy.

name: Shock Ribbon
title: the Once Cowardly
desc: A Ribbon for recalling a thrilling event that made life more exciting.

name: Downcast Ribbon
title: the Once Shaken
desc: A Ribbon for recalling feelings of sadness that added spice to life.

name: Careless Ribbon
title: the Once Imperfect
desc: A Ribbon for recalling a careless error that helped steer life decisions.

name: Relax Ribbon
title: the Once Well-Rested
desc: A Ribbon for recalling a refreshing event that added sparkle to life.

name: Snooze Ribbon
title: the Once Sleepy
desc: A Ribbon for recalling a deep slumber that made life soothing.

name: Smile Ribbon
title: the Once Cheery
desc: A Ribbon for recalling that smiles enrich the quality of life.

name: Gorgeous Ribbon
title: the Gorgeous
desc: An extraordinarily gorgeous and extravagant Ribbon.

name: Royal Ribbon
title: the Royal
desc: An incredibly regal Ribbon with an air of nobility.

name: Gorgeous Royal Ribbon
title: the Gorgeous Royal
desc: A gorgeous and regal Ribbon that is the peak of fabulous.

name: Footprint Ribbon
title: the Strutter
desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon deemed to have a top-quality footprint.

name: Record Ribbon
title: the Record Holder
desc: A Ribbon awarded for setting an incredible record.

name: Legend Ribbon
title: the Living Legend
desc: A Ribbon awarded for setting a legendary record.

name: Best Friends Ribbon
title: the Great Friend
desc: A Ribbon that can be given to a Pokémon with which you share a close and meaningful bond.

name: Training Ribbon

desc: A Ribbon that can be given to a Pokémon that has overcome rigorous trials and training.

name: Battle Royal Master Ribbon
title: the Royal Master
desc: A Ribbon that can be given to a Pokémon that has achieved victory in the Battle Royal.

name: Master Rank Ribbon

desc: A ribbon awarded to a Pokémon that posed for a photograph in Hisui in the distant past.

desc: A rare ribbon found extremely infrequently on Pokémon obtained in a Surprise Trade.

desc: A Ribbon awarded for overcoming all difficult challenges.

desc: A Ribbon awarded for winning one hundred battles in a row.

desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon League Champion.

desc: A Ribbon awarded to a Pokémon League Champion.

name: Premier Ribbon

desc: A Ribbon awarded for a special holiday.

desc: A Ribbon awarded for participating in a special Pokémon event.

desc: A Ribbon that commemorates a birthday.

name: Special Ribbon

desc: A special Ribbon for a special day.

name: Souvenir Ribbon

desc: A Ribbon for cherishing a special memory.

name: Wishing Ribbon
